listitem.para: Methods to get timestamp from camera or object tracker?

varlistentry.term: Member robot_fingers::TriFingerPlatformFrontend::find_matching_timeindex (const FrontendType &other_frontend, const time_series::Index t_robot) const

listitem.para: The implementation below is very naive. It simply does a linear search starting from the latest time index. So worst case performance is O(n) where n is the number of "other" observations over the period that is covered by the buffer of the robot data.
